description.@en: There is no greater remedy for the fear of inadequacy than helping those who need it, and having them see me for what I am: a savior. Their adoration quiets the terror within me, reminding me I am capable and not just another victim.

effect.@en: Every time you succeed at a Skill Test to convince others you are the answer to someone else’s problems, take a Coin from the other pool and put it into your respective pool. If you fail, remove a Coin from your respective pool and place it into the other pool.
